Text: 8.0.3 works with Leopard - but bloody badly. Role on 8.0.4 when they get the thing working PROPERLY with Leopard.
8.0.1 works fine with Leopard, but 8.0.3 failed often when burning.

Strangely, Toast 6 apparently works the best with Leopard. No crashing, freezing, hours to burn a disk, or dock problems (do a google for the issues). Thats great accept Toast 6 is impossible to find.
